answers.answer: It automatically highlights errors in our code
It lets us keep track of changes to our project.
It allows us to create backups of our work
It helps us keep file names and folder orders organized and consistent.

source.guidance: Version control does not automatically highlight errors in our code, although it would be very nice!
source.instructions:
### Which one of the following is ++NOT++ a benefit of using a version control system?

Click the button below to submit.

source.name: Introduction to Version Control: What is Version Control?
